ygData.subject: Re: Clothing
ygData.msgSnippet: someone is selling robes right below the wizards guild.
ygData.messageBody:
someone is selling robes right below the wizards guild.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Teri [mailto:greenidminx@...]

> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Clothing
>
>
> From: "Teri" <greenidminx@...>

> Speaking of which, where does one obtain something other than

>

>
> Ximena
> ----- Original Message -----

> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>

> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Clothing

>
> > From: "Raphael Lowe" <sevendegrees@...>
> >
> > Aye, I agree. I heard there was a list of robes out there somewhere
> > that tells us what colors and types there are. I once directed a poor
> > lost Erudite to get a green robe...he traveled all the way across
> > country just because he liked the color green.
> >
> > I'm hunting for the glowing purple robes I've seen some Wizards with.
> > Another wiz once told me he got his from a GM after he died. :(
> >
> > --LimDul
> > High Elf Wiz 11th
> > Veeshan
